title: The incredible – and possibly true – Hollywood confessions of Scotty Bowers, 'escort to the stars'
text:
The Golden Age of Hollywood injected some much-needed glamour into Depression-era America, but the industry was insistent on keeping that polish gleaming bright. Sex was merely hinted at, and homosexuality was a strict no-go. The Big Five studios held fastidious control over the stars they created, arranging abortions and loveless marriages to keep scandal at bay.

But the great and the good of Tinseltown had just the same needs as any other human, not to mention the money to satisfy them. Enter Scotty Bowers, the celebrity fixer known as “Mr Sex” in Los Angeles for arranging “tricks” with titans of Hollywood and beyond.
